pr_title: Add tests for valid and invalid datasource names

timeline.message: Add tests for valid and invalid datasource names

timeline.bodyText: The test class can extend NullHandlingTest instead.
timeline.author: ccaominh

timeline.bodyText: Suggest adding a helper method that escapes VALID_DATASOURCE_CHARS_NAME. The helper method can be used here as well as in testSerializeWithInvalidDataSourceName()
timeline.author: ccaominh

timeline.bodyText: nit: it's actually InitializedNullHandlingTest that you want, but the one you've extended also initializes null handling
timeline.author: clintropolis
